snippet: The premiere a week ago attracted the fewest viewers ever of any new network drama in a regular season -- just 3.1 million.
abstract: The premiere a week ago attracted the fewest viewers ever of any new network drama in a regular season -- just 3.1 million.

headline.main: After Just Two Episodes, NBC Cancels 'Do No Harm'
headline.print_headline: Short-Lived ‘Do No Harm’  Is Canceled by NBC
